title: The Essays of Ralph Waldo Emerson, First and Second Series
description: binding: half natural linen, sides of blue laid paper, spine label in red and black affixed; endpapers: white wove; slip case: blue laid paper over cardboard, label in red and black affixed; type: Cloister Lightface; 274 pp.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
